C

ContainerDashboardItem<T> - Class in de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout
DashboardItem implementation extending the SimpleDashboardItem by the capability to act as a container for the actual object (the content-object) that should appear in the DashboardLayout.
ContainerDashboardItem(T, boolean) - Constructor for class de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout.ContainerDashboardItem
Creates a new ContainerDashboardItem from the given content-object, and sets it into the state given by the parameter enabled.
ContainerDashboardItem(long, String, Drawable, Drawable) - Constructor for class de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout.ContainerDashboardItem
Creates a new ContainerDashboardItem from the given parameters.
ContainerDashboardItem(long, String, Drawable, Drawable, boolean) - Constructor for class de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout.ContainerDashboardItem
Creates a new ContainerDashboardItem from the given parameters.
ContainerDashboardItem(long, String, Drawable, Drawable, T) - Constructor for class de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout.ContainerDashboardItem
Creates a new ContainerDashboardItem from the given parameters.
ContainerDashboardItem(long, String, Drawable, Drawable, T, boolean) - Constructor for class de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout.ContainerDashboardItem
Creates a new ContainerDashboardItem from the given parameters.

D

DashboardAdapter<T extends DashboardItem> - Class in de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout
This is the adapter holding the elements in the DashboardLayout.
DashboardAdapter(List<T>, LayoutInflater, View.OnClickListener) - Constructor for class de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout.DashboardAdapter
Creates a DashboardAdapter object with items, a given inflater to process the layout of the items properly and an OnClickListener so that clicks on items can be handled as the activity desires.
DashboardDataSetObserver - Class in de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout
This class implements the DataSetObserver-functionality and updates the DashboardLayout accordingly if called.
DashboardDataSetObserver(DashboardLayout) - Constructor for class de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout.DashboardDataSetObserver
Creates an DashboardDataSetObserver object.
DashboardItem - Interface in de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout
This interface is the base for all items displayed by the DashboardLayout.
DashboardItem.OnClickListener - Interface in de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout
Public internal interface for onClick-events.
DashboardItemContent - Interface in de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout
This interface should be used for all content-objects passed to the ContainerDashboardItem.
DashboardLayout - Class in de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout
The Dashboard layout is a self-organizing layout that contains items which are equally distributed across the screen's real-estate assigned to the layout.
DashboardLayout(Context) - Constructor for class de.dimensionv.android.widget.dashboardlayout.DashboardLayout
Creates a new DashboardLayout object and the given {link Context}-object.
